summary:
An energetic, focused and driven individual, approaching work in an organised and practical manner, paying great attention to detail. Having a strong sense of responsibility, and is not afraid of making and following through on difficult decisions. An excellent people manager and strong team player, but also works well independently and on her own initiative. Finally, a global entrepreneur who is considered to be an exceptional communicator, with excellent presentation skills. 

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Specialties: 

People management, Building up and containing long and strong relationships, Global oriented vision, Multicultural awareness & Business driven approach !
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

publications.name: "Zelfs in crisistijd kun je je droom realiseren" / "Even in times of crisis you can realize your dream"

authors.headline: Entrepreneurship l International Recruitment MENA Region l HR & Recruitment Consultancy l Training & Coaching l Secondment l Payrolling

profile_positions.description:
MENA Global Recruitment offers recruitment services to companies in the MENA region (Middle East and North Africa) for hiring qualified candidates from all over the globe. We have a database of candidates with different kind of career levels and working in different kind of industries. MENA Global Recruitment can assist you with finding suitable professionals, trainees and interns worldwide. Our main goal is to achieve the best possible match between employer and employee.

MENA Global Recruitment also offers assistance to companies in investing in start-up's or real estate mainly in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. If you choose for real estate as an investment opportunity we can also act as a local broker by offering rental services to expats in Amsterdam. We will offer you A to Z full service package. 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Looking for a new job in the MENA Region?
Register on: www.menaglobalrecruitment.com/register

Looking for an investment opportunity in the Netherlands? 
Contact me on: info@menaglobalrecruitment.com 
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
profile_positions.title: CEO, Founder & Owner

profile_positions.description: I started to follow a training program on entrepreneurship from January till June 2009.  After this training program, I started to do Market Research on Recruitment and Internship in the Middle East and North Africa. This has inspired me to build up MENA Global Recruitment, a company that offers recruitment services to both companies and universities.
profile_positions.title: Market Research on Recruitment and Internship in MENA region

profile_positions.description:
TeamUp is a coalition of Save the Children, War Child and UNICEF The Netherlands. These 3 NGO's are joining forces to help refugee children in the Netherlands. Their knowledge and experience is combined in a brand new programme titled ‘TeamUp’, which offers these children various activities such as sport, games and dance – giving them an opportunity to relax and deal with their bad experiences. This is extremely important so the children can feel safe again.

As a TeamUp Recruiter I actively search for volunteers who are willing to spend 3 - 4 hours a week to assist refugee children in The Netherlands with sport, game and dance activities.  The social emotional needs of refugee children in the Netherlands are often overlooked. From the moment they arrive here, their most pressing needs are relaxation, structure and safety. You can join TeamUp as a volunteer so they can be children again.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
More information about the vacancy: 
https://www.savethechildren.nl/over-ons/vacatures-bij-save-the-children/volunteer-facilitator-recreational-activities-for

Interested to join TeamUp as a volunteer please apply here: 
https://resourcemanager-15500fdb76b-155e0bade7d.secure.force.com/cxsrec__cxsSearchApply?formId=a00580000053nOa
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

volunteer_experiences.role: Trainer and Coach for students at the Huygens College, Amsterdam, the Netherlands
volunteer_experiences.description:
Task: Guide a group of students to follow an Entrepreneur Coaching Program named
“Entrepreneurship, this is how you do it!”
http://www.huygens-college.nl/

volunteer_experiences.role: Board Member and Chairman "Kantara-Brug", Amsterdam, the Netherlands
volunteer_experiences.description:
Kantara-Brug acts as a bridge between people with different cultural, ethnic and religious backgrounds. This foundation creates integration projects to promote solidarity among populations.  

Task: Participate in meetings to discuss, coordinate and realize these integration projects.

volunteer_experiences.role: Board Member of Control Group "de Honingraat",  Amsterdam, the Netherlands
volunteer_experiences.description:
This Control Group consists of a group of neighbours and district members of “Eigenwijks”
Task: Participate in meetings to discuss social activity projects submitted by neighbours to be
held in the neighbourhood in order to liaise neighbours. 

As a Group we decide whether the social activity project should be accepted, adapted or rejected.
http://www.eigenwijks.nl/slotermeer

volunteer_experiences.role: Board Member of Hogeschool Zuyd, Maastricht, the Netherlands
volunteer_experiences.description:
Field of Study: “Oriental Languages and Communication”

Task: Participate in meetings to discuss matters so that education can be adapted to Business Industry in Arabic countries. 

Goal is to train and prepare students as good as possible for future employment or business affaires in the region.
http://www.otcmaastricht.nl/
